name: Space Shooter BANG!
description:
This is an alpha build of a small space shooter game I've been working on, it's rather simplistic at the moment and I hope to improve upon it in the future, please give any feedback you can!

Controls:

W - Move up

A - Move left

D - Move right

S - Move down

Rightclick - Lazer

Leftclick - Rocket

Saves your personal highscores!

Credit to:
http://getwallpapers.com/ - For the main menu and game over background!
